content: Hello. How can I set up publisher.jar to talk to my terminology server specified in -tx with jsons and not xmls?
oh, I don't think you can? I've never paid any attention to which format it uses.
no, it looks like you can't, so make a task for HAPI core on github (or a PR) so you can specify what format to use

@Grahame Grieve done https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/404
I'm not sure whether I should create issue for HL7/fhir-ig-publisher or hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core since it looks like json format is supported in hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core and it's just about adding a parameter for publisher.jar
